corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: take or declare rightful ownership of.

sentence.text: There had been fears in Lithuania that Poland might claim part of its territory , including Vilnius .
